name: E2. LCM Sum  hard version
statement:
Some NumberYou are given two positive integers l and r.Count the number
of distinct triplets of integers (i, j, k) such that l
le i < j < k
le r and
operatorname{lcm}(i,j,k)
ge i + j + k.Here
operatorname{lcm}(i, j, k) denotes the least common multiple (LCM) of
integers i, j, and k.
